short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Talk to YouTube videos with ChatGPT. Ask it to make chapters, ask it to give summary, or anything else you want to ask.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
GiPiTube enables you to chat with any YouTube video - ask questions, get summaries, pinpoint key points and so much more!

🎓 Online Learning
📖 Instant Summaries
🖥️ Product Reviews
🗺️ Travel Planning
🍕 Food Recommendations
and more!

How to use:
1. Install this extension
2. Open a YouTube
3. Start chatting by clicking the blue chat icon over each video

If you need help, feel free to contact: veb3dev@gmail.com
